name: Mixed Bag 31 Quiz | Mixed 10 Q. Tough [C] | 10 Questions

questions.text: What autumnal flower is associated with Japan?
questions.explanation:
Chrysanthemum.

	It is the national flower of Japan.

questions.text: What was the nickname of the B-24 bomber?
questions.explanation:
Liberator.

	It was manufactured by Consolidated Aircraft Corporation. It carried a crew of 8 to 12 people and had a range of 2100 miles.

questions.text: What is Richard Chamberlain's real first name?
questions.explanation:
George.

	He was born George Richard Chamberlain in Beverly Hills.His career was interrupted while he served two years in Korea.

John Huston.

	It starred Humphrey Bogart. There was also a 1931 version directed by Roy Del Ruth.

Skull Island.

	He was taken to New York for display during the time of economic depression.

questions.text: Who played Jane for the Tarzan played by Johnny Weismuller?
questions.explanation:
Maureen O'sullivan.

	She was the 'Jane' in the majority of his movies.

questions.text: According to the story what was the last thing left in 'Pandora's Box'?
questions.explanation:
Hope.

	The box was actually a large vase which when she opened it all the evils flew out, leaving hope still remaining.

questions.text: What city was destroyed in the movie 'Earthquake'?
questions.explanation:
Los Angeles.

	It was released in 1974 and was an Academy Award winner for best sound and special achievement in visual effects.

questions.text: What was the name of the boat in the movie 'High Society'?
questions.explanation:
True Love.

	'High Society' was the musical version of 'The Philadelphia Story' with co-stars Frank Sinatra and Bing Crosby among others.

questions.text: Who solved the 'Death On The Nile' case?
questions.explanation:
Hercule Poirot.

	It became a British motion picture with Peter Ustinov playing Poirot.
